feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T08:06:46.409049Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我对 Nix 的第一印象</stitle>; <id>;https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 19T07:05:16.982944Z</updated>; <link href="https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/ae57cc51889fbe1643c1a73bbd2f7e83afe3be70/aac5f/notes/ nix-first-impressions/hashimoto-tweet.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：154px；" />;<br />;Nix是一个根据源文件配置软件环境的工具。它允许您在源代码中定义计算机系统的配置，并使系统进入该状态。 Nix 旨在配置其所在的环境，而 Ansible 旨在通过网络配置系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-first-impressions-of-nix" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;同时在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an -indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T04:05:16.985247Z</updated>; <link href= “https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years”/>; <作者>; <名称>;plateofsoup</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// juicybeast.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles -at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387030" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建一个FPGA 上的联网键值存储</stitle>; <id>;https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:05:16.991904Z< /updated>; <link href="https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://adamwalker.github.io/images/arty.png" style="width: 220px;高度：220px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于在功能性硬件描述语言 Clash 中构建基于 FPGA 的网络键值存储。它描述了 FPGA 定制的哈希表设计、测试框架及其性能和资源使用情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-networked-key-value-store-on-an-fpga" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;草图系统</stitle>; <id>;https://sketch .systems</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T06:05:16.992442Z</updated>; <link href="https://sketch.systems"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Sketch.systems 是一个基于状态图形式主义的草图工具，由 David Harel 在80年代。它允许用户通过单击图表来浏览系统草图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sketch-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36378731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Swing VPN 应用是一个 DDoS 僵尸网络</stitle>; <id>;https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T19:05:16.993024Z </updated>; <link href="https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/"/>; <author>; <name>;campuscodi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=campuscodi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lecromee.github.io/image/swing/android_install.png" style="width: 220px ; 高度：107px;" />;<br />;Swing VPN 应用程序通过将其用户转变为攻击僵尸网络，利用其用户群访问 DDOS 站点。该应用程序每 10 秒向特定网站发送一次请求，以特定端点为目标使服务器资源过载。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#swing-vpn-app-is-a-ddos-botnet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36382700" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Openjob：最佳分布式任务调度框架</stitle>; <id>;https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T04:05:16.993547Z</updated>; <link href="https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/"/>; <author>; <name>;swoft</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swoft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hsto.org/r/w1560/getpro/ habr/upload_files/77e/f01/d41/77ef01d419ec7e321f7f576030789d23.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;Openjob是一个分布式、高性能的任务调度框架，支持多个cronjob、延时任务、workflow，轻量级分布式计算，无限水平扩展，具有高扩展性和容错性。还有完善的权限管理，强大的告警监控，支持多种语言]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387141" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Keycloak – 开源身份和访问管理访谈</stitle>; <id>;https://console. substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T22:05： 16.994341Z</updated>; <link href="https://console.substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern -applications"/>; <author>; <name>;ph4ni</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ph4ni</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws .com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F1f02d299-2c64-4e17-a333-47d3054df48d_1600x836.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Keycloak 是一种用于现代应用程序和服务的开源身份和访问管理解决方案。它提供了一种简单而安全的身份验证和用户管理方法，支持 OpenID Connect、OAuth 等标准协议2.0 和 SAML。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-interview" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何使用 50M Toffoli 门计算 256 位椭圆曲线密钥</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/ abs/2306.08585</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:05:16.995502Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585"/>; <author>; <name>;aburan28 </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aburan28</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv .org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们使用 Shor 算法计算椭圆曲线私钥，作为硅光子学启发的活动体积架构中资源估计的案例研究。非本地连接降低了每次成本与 2D 局部架构相比，键值提高了 300-700 倍。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-compute-a-256-bit-elliptic-curve-key-with -50m-toffoli-gates" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387371" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HDR二维码</stitle>; < id>;https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:05:16.996145Z</updated>; <link href="https://notes.dt.in .th/HDRQRCode"/>; <author>; <name>;fdb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fdb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://notes.dt.in.th/d7fc70-circle-192.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;这是一个 HDR 二维码。如果您在 Apple 设备的内置显示器上查看它，它应该可以工作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#hdr-qr-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Redbean 系统</stitle>; < id>;https://redbean.systems/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T20:05:16.996699Z</更新>; <link href="https://redbean.systems/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章是一个Python脚本，设置建立一个用于运行客户端代码的安全沙箱。它使用 Cosmopolitan 库并实施各种安全措施，例如资源限制、进程分叉和系统调用限制。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#redbean-系统" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;世界海洋中有多少沉船？</stitle >; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T01： 05:16.997201Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans"/>; <作者>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://ychef.files.bbci.co.uk/976x549/p0ft978s.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本周联合国教科文组织宣布发现三艘新沉船，其中两艘已有数千年历史。根据联合国教科文组织的分析，世界海洋中有超过三百万艘未被发现的沉船。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-world-s-oceans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36374370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：Answer Overflow – 将 Discord 内容索引到网络中</stitle>; <id>;https://www.answeroverflow.com/ </id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:05:16.997704Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.answeroverflow.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;rhyssullivan1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rhyssullivan1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.answeroverflow.com/answer -overflow-banner-v3.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Answer Overflow 是一个开源项目，旨在将 discord 频道引入您最喜爱的搜索引擎，使用户能够轻松、快速地找到他们需要的信息。了解您的社区最关心的问题以及在何处改进您的文档。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-answer-overflow-indexing-discord-content-into-the-web" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383773" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPU 编程：何时、为何以及如何？</stitle>; <id>;https://enccs。 github.io/gpu-programming/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T01:05:16.998210Z</更新>; <link href="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/"/ >; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/_static/ENCCS.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 236px;" />;<br />;图形处理单元 (GPU) 是全球许多高性能计算 (HPC) 系统的主力。Top500 中启用 GPU 的超级计算机的数量近年来一直在稳步增长并且这种发展有望继续。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpu-programming-when-why-and-how" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成</stitle>; <id>;https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:05:16.998752Z</updated>; <link href="https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done"/>; <author>; <name>;kiyanwang</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kiyanwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://boz.com/get- it-done.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;在我的职业生涯中，我发现我必须经常给出的建议是让人们更直接地利用他们的领导。我经常看到负责实现重要目标的人在巨大的困难面前尽最大努力。这样一份工作的任务不是“尽你所能”，而是完成它。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #get-it-done" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383322" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;语言学家发现了一种新的英语方言出现在南佛罗里达</stitle>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida-205620</id>; <updated >;2023-06-18T20:05:16.999828Z</updated>; <link href="https://theconversation.com/linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south- florida-205620"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://images.theconversation.com/files/530654/original/file-20230607-23-bbcsrb.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=3%2C9%2C2171%2C1548&q=20&auto= format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip" style="width: 220px; height: 157px;" />;<br />;由于西班牙语和英语使用者之间的持续接触，南佛罗里达州出现了一种新的英语方言。这种方言的特点是借用西班牙语单词并直接从西班牙语翻译。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383521" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1990 年代的神经网络</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T01:05:17.000560Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心——让我们再试一次. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neural-networks-in-the-1990s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36385809" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Miraheze 没有关闭</stitle>; <id>;https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T01： 05:17.001623Z</updated>; <link href="https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这对 Miraheze 用户来说是个好消息。感谢为改进和保持服务运行所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#miraheze-is-not-shutting-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36386112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;再见，Twilio</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/post/goodbye-twilio</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T18:05 :17.002090Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/post/goodbye-twilio"/>; <author>; <name>;joaopaulomcc</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=joaopaulomcc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/static/images/twilio-ask.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：109px；" />;<br />;将近四年后，我不再是 Twilio 的员工。公司重心和愿景的转变不再符合我的价值观和信念。我现在正在寻找一家具有开发人员至上文化的新公司。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#goodbye-twilio" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36382361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;想象中的问题是不良软件的根源</stitle>; <id>;https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T15:05:17.002706Z</updated>; <link href="https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software"/>; <author>; <name>;deofoo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=deofoo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c0/De_Rebus_Bellicis,_XVth_Century_Miniature.JPG" style="宽度：220px；高度： 148 像素；" />;<br />;不良软件的根源往往是想象中的问题。开发人员和其他部门创造想象中的问题，使他们的工作更有趣或填补空白。这导致忽视了真正需要解决的问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imaginary-problems-are-the-root-of-bad-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380711" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重建地球：用沙子建造的群岛正在带来新的生命</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/immersive/d41586 -023-01370-w/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T18:05:17.003523Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/immersive/d41586- 023-01370-w/index.html"/>; <author>; <name>;cpeterso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cpeterso</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nature.com/immersive/d41586-023-01370-w/assets/20Y6xR3l7f/2023-04-27_feature_marker-wadden_​​sh1-2560x1440.jpg" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：124px；” />;<br />;Marker Wadden 是荷兰一个占地 1,300 公顷的群岛，自 2016 年以来几乎完全使用从 Markermeer 湖底挖出的材料建造。它具有海洋特征，沙丘上的马拉姆草在沙丘上摇曳，贝壳散落在沙路上——但它坐落在一个淡水湖中。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rewilding-the-planet-an-archipelago-constructed-of-sand-is-bringing-new-life" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苏联向美国出售钛，认为他们需要它来制作披萨烤箱</stitle>; <id>;https://theaviationgeekclub .com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union-sold-titanium-to-the-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens-but-instead-they-used-it-to -build-the-iconic-sr-71-blackbird-mach-3-spy-plane/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:05:17.004195Z</updated>; <link href="https:/ /theaviationgeekclub.com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union-sold-titanium-to-the-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens-but-instead-they-used-it -to-build-the-iconic-sr-71-blackbird-mach-3-spy-plane/"/>; <author>; <name>;jerryjerryjerry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=jerryjerryjerry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/SR-71-披萨- oven.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;远程侦察机 SR-71 黑鸟的建造需要钛。美国秘密从他们的冷战敌人苏联购买钛来建造 SR- 71. 苏联人认为美国需要钛来制作披萨烤箱，却不知道他们正在为制造间谍飞机做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#soviet-union-sold-titanium- to-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36384548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;旅行报告：保加利亚瓦尔纳夏季 ISO C++ 标准会议</stitle>; <id>;https://herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting- varna-保加利亚/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T03:05:17.004711Z</updated>; <link href="https://herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer- iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/"/>; <作者>; <name>;agluszak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=agluszak</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://herbsutter.files.wordpress.com/2023/06/image.png?w=300" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;ISO C++ 委员会最近结束了在保加利亚瓦尔纳举行的会议，他们开始在 C++26 中采用特性。他们有来自 20 个国家的近 180 名与会者，并采纳了前 40 个提议更改 C++26 的文件，包括错误修复和新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-in-varna-bulgaria " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么你不能启动会议</stitle>; <id >;https://abnercoimbre.com/post/why-you-cant-kickstart-a-conference/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T00:05:17.005409Z</更新>; <link href="https //abnercoimbre.com/post/why-you-cant-kickstart-a-conference/"/>; <author>; <name>;abnercoimbre</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=abnercoimbre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://abnercoimbre.com/images/50k_discussion_discord_1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 155px;" />;<br />;编程语言节未能在 Kickstarter 上筹集到足够的资金。组织者 Context Free 要求筹集 50,000 美元，但只筹集到 8,709 美元。这篇文章分析了会议不可行的原因并提供未来组织者的经验教训。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-you-can-t-kickstart-a-conference" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385617" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WSL 1.3.10 带来实验性内存回收、更新的 DXCore 和 Linux 内核</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com /news/Microsoft-WSL-1.3.10</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T04:05:17.006016Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/news/Microsoft- WSL-1.3.10"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/microsoft.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;Microsoft 发布了适用于 Linux 的 Windows 子系统 (WSL) 的最新更新版本 1.3.10。此更新带来了实验性内存回收支持、目录更改、强制终止实例的超时，以及各种其他修复。它还包括更新的 Linux 5.15 LTS 内核点版本、WSLg 的图形支持更新以及 Microsoft DXCore Linux 代码的 DirectX 兼容性支持更新。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #wsl-1-3-10-brings-experimental-memory-reclaim-updated-dxcore-and-linux-kernel" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36387197" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;让微服务看起来像单体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/crufters/actio</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:05: 17.007018Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/crufters/actio"/>; <作者>; <name>;friendly_chap</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=friendly_chap</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crufters/actio/main/assets/actiologo.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 221px;" />;<br />;Actio 是一个现代的、包含电池的后端应用程序 Node.js (Typescript) 框架。它使您能够毫不费力地在单体和微服务架构之间切换。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#make-microservices-look-like-monoliths" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36372283" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
